details:
noun
- a consistency of low viscosity
= example: a consistency of low viscosity
- the property of having little body fat
= synonyms: leanness, spareness
- relatively small dimension through an object as opposed to its length or width
= synonyms: slenderness, tenuity
- the property of being scanty or scattered
= synonyms: spareness, sparseness, sparsity
- the property of being very narrow or thin
= synonyms: fineness
